ygData.subject: Selo's and root clarification
ygData.msgSnippet: Selo s works dirrently with the different root spells. Up in Everfrost last week and pulling Snow Orc Shaman at S. Tower.  Their root spell (mountain icon)
ygData.messageBody:
Selo's works dirrently with the different root spells.

Up in Everfrost last week and pulling Snow Orc Shaman
at S. Tower. Their root spell (mountain icon) would
stop me cold but it never lasted more than a few
moments while I was playing Selo's.

In North and West Karana I was fighting bandits and
raiders. Their root spell is the druid root (little
leafy tree icon) and I could continue to run while the
icon was on-screen.

Tyunes of Rodcet Nife
